subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Maharana Pratap and the Battle of Haldighati
question_en: Which battle was fought between Maharana Pratap and Mughal Emperor Akbar?
question_hi: महाराना प्रताप और मुगल समाज के अभिमान अकबर को मिला किस भाग के बैलेक्टर में आया था?
explanation_en:
The Second Battle of Haldighati took place between Maharana Pratap and Mughal Emperor Akbar in 1576. It was a significant battle fought for the control of Mewar region.
English Explanation:
The Second Battle of Haldighati (दूतावल) was fought between Maharana Pratap and Mughal Emperor Akbar in 1576. This battle took place for the control of Mewar region.
Hindi Explanation:
